QuestData.Title: Steamscar "Reagents"
QuestData.Description: Now we get to the heart of the matter, heh. Saberon have strong hearts, our shaman find many uses for them.$b$bI will search for the ancient's magic if you get me those hearts. Do we have a deal?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa saberon hearts from living saberon at Steamscar Rise.
QuestData.RewardText: These are good strong hearts! You have done well $c and I will hold my end of the bargain.
